caller_intent: The caller wanted to confirm the status of a pending policy cancellation notice and inquire about the timeline before the cancellation takes effect, as the insured has a new mortgage company.
resolution_steps: Agent verified the policyholder's name and address after the caller provided account details.
Agent confirmed a pending cancellation notice was scheduled for September 8 (NLC date).
Agent explained that the notice is the initial step and the actual cancellation typically occurs a couple of weeks after the NLC date.
Agent reassured the caller there was still time before the cancellation becomes effective.
knowledge_required: Understanding of Notice of Cancellation (NLC) documentation
systems_referenced: Utica National Insurance Group's internal policy database
summary: The caller inquired about a pending policy cancellation notice related to a new mortgage company. The agent verified the account, confirmed the NLC date of September 8, and explained that the actual cancellation would occur a couple of weeks after that date. The caller was reassured there was still time before the cancellation takes effect.
